segments.text: From my viewpoint, the kitchen looks busy yet chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman polishes her dish towel in hand, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet runs unchecked, flooding the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral expression hides the danger at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes wait on the counter, innocent bystanders.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy stretches toward the cabinet's cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool beneath him sways, threatening to topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, sharing the thrill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches out, her face full of expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing sweets, breaking the household rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the window frames a peaceful garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It saddens me to see such risks in a homey space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away; something's bound to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window highlights the impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
